DOC.brief_title: Safety Exploratory Efficacy Study Collagen Membrane With Mesenchymal Stem Cells Treatment Skin Defects
DOC.criteria: Age 18 70 , borh gender . Patient able willing sign inform consent comply study procedure . Women childbearing potential must use birth control pill , barrier abstinence negative pregnancy test . Deep partial full thickness skin defect least 9 cm2 require surgical wound coverage due : burn injury , diabetic foot ulcer wound cause mechanical damage iatrogenic injury . Patient refusal . Patient documented history allergy sensitivity animal product use preparation skin substitute . These product include bovine blood , bovine collagen , bovine collagenase . Patient documented history allergy sensitivity antimicrobial reagent use preparation application skin substitute include irrigation solution use grafting . Patient current diagnosis invasive burn wound infection unexcised burn wound . Patient tunnel sinus tract completely debrided . Serious primary disease liver , kidney hematopoietic system , Abnormal liver function ( glutamicpyruvic transaminase ( ALT ) , glutamicoxalacetic transaminase ( AST ) 2 time higher normal value ) , creatinine ( Cr ) high upper limit normal value . Other clinical trial participant within 3 month . A random blood sugar read > /=450 mg/dL . Investigators judge condition suitable inclusion .
